React app


Addition and sorting comments React application. Using React + Babel and Bootstrap4 + React-Bootstrap + FontAwesome styling

Subscribe form

Firm Webpage


Concept landing page for commercial firm. Including jQuery swiping, form validations via Html5 attributes. Also here is playing video just by javascript excluding html5 resources

JS app with adding and editing option


Application includes text-forms with javascript validation to add info and table with option to edit datas. Whole application made just by javascript, no js frameworks. For styling were used Skeleton and FontAwesome

Rocketmen React version


ReactJS application with Bootstrap4 styling. You can add new rocketman, sort the list of rocketmen by name, surname, date or superpower as well as edit rocketman's info or remove the one. Also you are able to search in the list

Letters catcher


JavaScript canvas game. Rules are inside. Meanwhile you are bored - try to catch all letters, don't let them to fall!

Using jQuery for photo gallery and animation, including CSS animation
